thread.title: Mr Alex Perlmutter
thread.title_full: Outdoor and Country (www.outdoorandcountry.co.uk) reviewed by Mr Alex Perlmutter

author: Mr Alex Perlmutter
title: Mr Alex Perlmutter
text: There was a tear in my jacket that opened up after two weeks of wearing it. I sent back the item no questions asked. My shipping charges were covered and they sent back what appears to be a brand new item. Great job Outdoor and Country!
